Ref: CXP033/2023
Location: Prospecton, Durban

Co-ordinate and supervise staff and daily operations to achieve daily production plan in line with established SOPs, quality, cost, and safety requirements.

The role requires strict adherence to safety standards, collection schedules and manufacturing outputs, as well as ongoing communication with all stakeholders to ensure daily outputs are achieved safely and efficiently.

Salary: R300 – R336k per annum

Main Duties include:

-Effective supervision of staff

-Ongoing monitoring of compliance to safety, quality, and output requirements in line with SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)

-Cross-functional communication, co-ordination and problem-solving

-Participation in growth and continuous improvement activities

-Teamwork and self-management

-Supervisory management

-Relationship-building and facilitation

Criteria:

-Grade 12 (NQF level 3 literacy and numeracy)

-Degree or Diploma in Operations/Production or Management

-5+ years experience in Logistics/Operations

-Safety and ISO and understanding safety critical components

-Quality Inspection

-Computer Literacy

-Heavy machine certification (trucks, excavator, static machinery [baler and shredder], front end loader)

-Valid Code 14 with PDP

-Strong planning, organizing, co-ordination and monitoring skills. Analytical, observant, and methodical

-Practical mindset with hands on approach.
